stories.original_headline: A rare cancer-fighting plant compound has finally been decoded
stories.original_summary: UBC Okanagan researchers have uncovered how plants create mitraphylline, a rare natural compound linked to anti-cancer effects. By identifying two key enzymes that shape and twist molecules into their final form, the team solved a puzzle that had stumped scientists for years. The discovery could mak
stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Unravel the Secret of a Rare Healing Herb!
stories.fantasy_story: Wise alchemists from the Silverwood Citadel have finally understood how a rare forest plant creates its potent healing essence. They discovered two magical spirits within the plant that shape its powers. This knowledge could help them brew more of this precious elixir to fight the spreading Blight.

stories.original_headline: Two new wireless Samsung speakers for 2026 lean into aesthetics
stories.original_summary: For years, Samsung has made products that try to camouflage what they are by displaying works of art. The Frame TV is the most famous example, but the company also released the Music Frame, a speaker disguised as a picture frame, at last year's CES. Now, instead of hiding a speaker with a piece of [
stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Samsung Clan Unveils New Hidden Music Artifacts!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Grand Samsung Clan of merchants has long crafted enchanted artifacts that blend seamlessly with their surroundings. Following their famous 'Art Canvas' viewing mirrors, they now offer 'Melody Frames' â€“ magical music boxes disguised as beautiful paintings. These new enchanted devices bring music into homes while remaining a hidden wonder.
